subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description: 2.4.1.Strengthened institutional and technical capacity of police services in Somalia utilizing community and rights-based approach.
subproject.title: Civilian Police - Somaliland

subproject.description: 2.4.1.Strengthened institutional and technical capacity of police services in Somalia utilizing community and rights-based approach.
subproject.title: Civilian Police - Somaliland

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description:
Capacity development of national counterparts, emergency basic recruit training, provision of minimum basic operational equipment, provision of stipends to properly trained and monitored civilian police personnel along with the provision of said
training and police station infrastructure.To build the capacity of the civilian police services in Puntland in conjunction with managing the Special Protection Units in preparation for government authorities to take full control of them.
donor_long: United Nations Office on Drug and Crime
subproject.title: Civilian Police - Puntland

subproject.description:

subproject.corporate outcome: Effective, responsive, accessible and fair justice systems promote the rule of law, including both formal and informal processes, with due consideration on the rights of the poor, women and vulnerable groups
subproject.description:
2.4.1 Strengthened institutional and technical capacity of police services in Somalia utilizing community and rights based approach

2.4.2 Improved credibility, efficacy and independence of the judicial system 

2.2.1 Improved functional capacities of public servants and institutions to design, enact, and implement public sector reforms including administrative law and process

2.5.1 Capacities of local authorities developed and regulatory processes established or strengthened to ensure accountable provision of services 

4.1.1 Leadership, technical skills and advocacy capacity of women enhanced (incl. Public Speaking, Facilitation, leadership and organizational management) to promote gender equality
subproject.title: CIVILIAN POLICE PROJECT MANAGE
